#Text=Monsieur ,  the old mountebank said to me ; " it is a matter of exercise and habit , that is all !

column1: #Text=Of course , one requires to be a little gifted that way and not to be butter-fingered , but what is chiefly necessary is patience and daily practice for long , long years .

#Text=Thus we became good friends , and he explained to me , very modestly , the real trick which the crowd do not understand , the eternal trick contained in these simple words :  To be gifted by nature and to practice every day for long , long years .
